Name: Display Reading Seq.
checklistText:
2.8 DISPLAY READING SEQUENCE AND TIME INTERVALS 

a. 	Report the following displays in the order shown at the time
	intervals specified below:

	DISPLAY						TIME INTERVAL 

	BEARING					At start of sortie and each 15
	and RANGE					minutes or as requested by MCC. 
 
	AMP-HR						At start of sortie and as requested
	and DISTANCE				by MCC.

	BATTERY°F 					At start of sortie and as requested
	by MCC.

	AMPS						Steady state at start of sortie,
								each 15 minutes when at constant
								speed, when climbing steep obstacles
								and when climbing different slopes.

	VOLTS x 1/2					At start of sortie and as requested
	by MCC. 

	MOTOR °F 					When requested by MCC.

	SPEED						When requested by MCC.

	PITCH and					During Navigation System initialization
	ROLL 						and update.

	HEADING 					During Navigation System update
